CALL-4217.title: Issue identification
CALL-4217.summary: Customer reports Error 505 on BOGO coupon and full charge of $45 instead of discounted price.

CALL-4217.title: Agent response
CALL-4217.summary: Agent acknowledges system did not recognize code 505 at final transaction; known issue being patched.

CALL-4217.title: Resolution
CALL-4217.summary: Agent processes partial refund for the difference; 3-5 business days.

CALL-5502.title: Issue identification
CALL-5502.summary: Customer received delivery order #4492 with half the bags missing; receipt lists items not in bag.

CALL-5502.title: Missing items
CALL-5502.summary: Two Spicy Chicken Sandwiches and large Super Onion Rings missing; bag seal intact.

CALL-5502.title: Resolution
CALL-5502.summary: Agent issues full refund for missing items plus $15 credit; will notify store on 5th street.

CALL-6110.title: Issue identification
CALL-6110.summary: Customer trapped in drive-thru at downtown location; has not moved in 20 minutes.

CALL-6110.title: Escalation
CALL-6110.summary: Customer cannot exit due to curbs; staff visible inside; situation unacceptable.

CALL-6110.title: Resolution
CALL-6110.summary: Agent contacted manager; POS system down and rebooting; cars will move manually shortly.
